text: وَلَقَدِ ٱسۡتُهۡزِئَ بِرُسُلٖ مِّن قَبۡلِكَ فَحَاقَ بِٱلَّذِينَ سَخِرُواْ مِنۡهُم مَّا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ يَسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ

translation.en: And already were messengers ridiculed before you, but those who mocked them were enveloped by that which they used to ridicule
translation.id: Dan sungguh, beberapa Rasul sebelum engkau (Muhammad) telah diperolok-olokkan, sehingga turunlah azab kepada orang-orang yang mencemoohkan itu sebagai balasan atas olok-olokan mereka
